names.name: Aaron
names.description: Brother of Moses and first high priest

names.name: Abner
names.description: Commander of Saul's army

names.name: Abram
names.description: Original name of Abraham, the father of many nations

names.name: Adoni
names.description: King Adoni-Zedek of Jerusalem

names.name: Amasa
names.description: Commander of Absalom’s army

names.name: Amnon
names.description: Son of David, known for assaulting Tamar

names.name: Asaph
names.description: Levite and psalmist appointed by David

names.name: Asher
names.description: Son of Jacob; ancestor of the tribe of Asher

names.name: Balak
names.description: King of Moab who opposed Israel

names.name: Barak
names.description: Military leader who defeated Sisera

names.name: Beeri
names.description: Father of the prophet Hosea

names.name: Caleb
names.description: Faithful spy and leader of Judah

names.name: David
names.description: Second king of Israel; slayer of Goliath

names.name: Debir
names.description: King defeated by Joshua

names.name: Eglon
names.description: King of Moab, killed by Ehud

names.name: Eliab
names.description: Eldest brother of David

names.name: Elihu
names.description: Young man who spoke in the book of Job

names.name: Elkan
names.description: Father of Samuel, husband of Hannah

names.name: Epher
names.description: Grandson of Abraham through Midian

names.name: Enoch
names.description: Walked faithfully with God and was taken to heaven

names.name: Ethan
names.description: A wise man in Solomon's time

names.name: Felix
names.description: Roman procurator of Judea who imprisoned Paul.

names.name: Gomer
names.description: Wife of Hosea, symbolic of Israel’s unfaithfulness

names.name: Hagar
names.description: Sarah’s maid and mother of Ishmael

names.name: Haman
names.description: Villain in the book of Esther

names.name: Helez
names.description: One of David’s mighty warriors

names.name: Herod
names.description: King during Jesus’ birth who ordered massacre

names.name: Hiram
names.description: King of Tyre who provided materials for Solomon

names.name: Hosea
names.description: Prophet who wrote the book of Hosea

names.name: Isaac
names.description: Son of Abraham and Sarah, and father of Jacob

names.name: Ishma
names.description: One of David’s mighty warriors

names.name: Ithai
names.description: Gittite who loyally followed David

names.name: Jacob
names.description: Son of Isaac; father of the 12 tribes

names.name: James
names.description: Brother of Jesus and leader in the early church

names.name: Jason
names.description: Early Christian who hosted Paul

names.name: Jesse
names.description: Father of King David.

names.name: Jesus
names.description: The Son of God, Savior and central figure of the New Testament

names.name: Joash
names.description: King of Judah who repaired the temple

names.name: Jonah
names.description: Prophet swallowed by a great fish

names.name: Jonas
names.description: Greek form of Jonah

names.name: Joram
names.description: King of Israel and Judah

names.name: Joses
names.description: Brother of Jesus (variant of Joseph)

names.name: Lotan
names.description: Descendant of Seir the Horite

names.name: Micah
names.description: Minor prophet and book of prophecy

names.name: Moses
names.description: Led the Israelites out of Egypt

names.name: Naomi
names.description: Mother-in-law of Ruth

names.name: Nehum
names.description: One of the minor prophets in Ezra's genealogy

names.name: Palti
names.description: One of the twelve spies

names.name: Peter
names.description: Apostle, fisherman, and early church leader

names.name: Rhoda
names.description: Servant girl who recognized Peter's voice

names.name: Rufus
names.description: Christian greeted by Paul in Romans

names.name: Salim
names.description: Place near Aenon where John baptized

names.name: Sarah
names.description: Wife of Abraham and mother of Isaac.

names.name: Satan
names.description: Adversary and accuser in the Bible

names.name: Sheba
names.description: Queen who visited Solomon

names.name: Silas
names.description: Companion of Paul on missionary journeys

names.name: Simon
names.description: Includes Simon Peter and Simon the Zealot

names.name: Tamar
names.description: Daughter-in-law of Judah

names.name: Titus
names.description: Companion of Paul; recipient of a pastoral epistle

names.name: Uriah
names.description: Hittite soldier in David's army

names.name: Uzzah
names.description: Touched the Ark and died

names.name: Zadok
names.description: High priest during the reign of King David

names.name: Zebah
names.description: Midianite king defeated by Gideon

names.name: Zebud
names.description: Son of Nathan; official of Solomon

names.name: Zenas
names.description: Christian lawyer mentioned by Paul

names.name: Zerah
names.description: Son of Judah and Tamar

names.name: Zimri
names.description: King of Israel who reigned for seven days

names.name: Zohar
names.description: Father of Ephron the Hittite

places.name: Adami
places.description: A location near Zered; in Naphtali’s territory

places.name: Aroer
places.description: A city east of the Jordan River

places.name: Babel
places.description: Where God confused human language

places.name: Betel
places.description: Another form of Bethel, “house of God”

places.name: Bozra
places.description: City in Edom, known for judgment prophecies

places.name: Cabul
places.description: A region near Tyre given to Hiram

places.name: Chios
places.description: An island Paul passed on his journey

places.name: Debir
places.description: City defeated by Joshua

places.name: Dibon
places.description: Town east of Jordan, Moabite region

places.name: Ebron
places.description: Likely a variant of Hebron (less common)

places.name: Gedor
places.description: Town in Judah

places.name: Gibea
places.description: Variant of Gibeah

places.name: Golan
places.description: City of refuge

places.name: Hazor
places.description: Major Canaanite city defeated by Joshua

places.name: Helam
places.description: Battle site where David fought Arameans

places.name: Horem
places.description: One of the towns in Naphtali

places.name: Jokim
places.description: Mentioned in priestly genealogy

places.name: Lodow
places.description: Possibly a variant, may need verification

places.name: Merom
places.description: Lake in northern Israel, site of battle

places.name: Mizpe
places.description: Short for Mizpeh or Mizpah

places.name: Nobah
places.description: Man and city in Gilead

places.name: Perga
places.description: Paul preached here during his journeys

places.name: Ramah
places.description: Hometown of Samuel the prophet

places.name: Salem
places.description: Melchizedek’s city, possibly Jerusalem

places.name: Salim
places.description: Near Aenon, where John baptized

places.name: Sheba
places.description: Kingdom visited Solomon with gifts

places.name: Sidon
places.description: Coastal city of Phoenicia

places.name: Sinai
places.description: Mountain where Moses received the Law

places.name: Sodom
places.description: City destroyed for its wickedness

places.name: Tabor
places.description: Mountain in Israel, site of Deborah’s battle

places.name: Tamar
places.description: Outpost in southern Judah

places.name: Zelah
places.description: Town in Benjamin where Saul was buried

places.name: Zoara
places.description: Town spared from Sodom's destruction

animals.name: Beast
animals.description: Generic term for wild animals or symbolic creatures

animals.name: Quail
animals.description: Bird God provided in the wilderness

animals.name: Sheep
animals.description: Common livestock, symbol of God’s people

animals.name: Snake
animals.description: Serpent; often symbolizes deception or evil

things.name: Altar
things.description: A structure for offerings or sacrifices

things.name: Arrow
things.description: Projectile weapon shot from a bow

things.name: Bason
things.description: Bowl used for washing or sacrifices

things.name: Blood
things.description: Symbol of life and used in sacrifices

things.name: Chain
things.description: Used for binding or as ornament

things.name: Horns
things.description: Used on altars, symbol of strength

things.name: Lamps
things.description: Used for light, symbolic of guidance

things.name: Manna
things.description: Food from heaven for the Israelites

things.name: Olive
things.description: Tree or oil, symbol of peace

things.name: Shoes
things.description: Footwear, sometimes removed on holy ground

things.name: Staff
things.description: Walking stick or symbol of leadership

things.name: Tares
things.description: Weeds in parable of the sower

things.name: Water
things.description: Essential for life, symbolic of cleansing

things.name: Woods
things.description: Trees or forest, resource for building
